titleStmt.title: A funeral sermon on his late Royal Highness, William, Duke of Glocester preach'd Aug. the 4th. 1700. By W. Fleetwood, chaplain in ordinary to His Majesty.
titleStmt.author: Fleetwood, William, 1656-1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: London, rinted; and re-printed in Dublin at the back of Dick's coffee-house in Skinner-Row: and are to be sold by Matthew Gunn at his shop in Essex-Street,

notesStmt.note: Second title page (A1) reads: A sermon preach'd Aug. the 4th 1700.
Reproduction of the original in the Marsh's Library, St. Patrick's, Dublin.

place.placeName: Dublin at the back of Dick's coffee-house in Skinner-Row:
